Title: Directs the public service commission to conduct a full cost benefit analysis on renewable energy systems; and makes changes in relation to greenhouse gas emission limits
Summary: Directs the public service commission to conduct a full cost benefit analysis of the technical and economic feasibility of renewable energy systems in the state of New York and to compare such directly with other methods of electricity generation; makes certain changes relating to greenhouse gas emissions limits.
LawCode: Amd §75-0107, En Con L; amd §§66-p & 137, add §66-x, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the public service law, in relation to directing the public service commission to conduct a full cost benefit analysis of the technical and economic feasibility of renewable energy systems in the state of New York and to compare such directly with other methods of electricity generation and makes certain changes relating to greenhouse gas emissions limits
